name: pluckily
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
in a way that shows courage and a strong will to succeed: He pluckily put up with the pain and carried on to the finish line. She had nobody to help her, so she pluckily did all the decorating herself.
More examplesFewer examplesAfter her marriage ended, she battled pluckily to feed and clothe her children.Rather pluckily, she attempted to give the presentation in Finnish.He had to leave the pitch for treatment to a nasty cut above the eye, but pluckily returned in the second half of the match.
